name: Aunt Glörgf's alien birthday cake bakery
name_original: Aunt Glörgf's alien birthday cake bakery
description:
We at Aunt Glörgf's believe that everyone in this universe deserve the best birthday cake. That is why we use only the best and most delicious ingredients. Unfortunatelly our supplier uses faster-than-light delivery cars and therefore our supplies are being delivered in an unorderly manner. Some arrived million years ago, others ended in a completely wrong timelines. Your job is to assemble the birthday cakes to the costumer's liking. Each ingrdient has a different popularity. And don't forget:

A finished layer is the best layer!

Controls: Left key, Right key, Down key, Spacebar
